subject: College Athletics
Basketball
NCAA Basketball Tournament (Men)
lead_paragraph: Down by 13 points in the second half, Siena battled back behind a raucous crowd of 10,679 and is going to the N.C.A.A. tournament for the third straight year.
snippet: Down by 13 points in the second half, Siena battled back behind a raucous crowd of 10,679 and is going to the N.C.A.A. tournament for the third straight year.
